overview: Daniel, a young musician living in Los Angeles, is being pursued by a stalker. But when the obsessed fan follows him home, the reality of the situation — and who is really stalking who starts to unravel.
tagline: Daniel, a young musician living in Los Angeles, is being pursued by a stalker. But when the obsessed fan follows him home, the reality of the situation — and who is really stalking who starts to unravel.
title: Daniel
